name: A Stickman Hitman (17+) - Rival Gangs At War
name_original: A Stickman Hitman (17+) - Rival Gangs At War
description:
** 100% FREE! EVERYTHING UNLOCKED! **
** ACTION PACKED, BLOODY SNIPER GAME! **

Get read for a wild stickman shooting game! In this action packed sniper game, you are a professional stickman hitman on a mission to take out an evil gang who are trying to assemble a nuclear weapon.

Who hired you?

Thats classified, but the bottom line is you need to get the job done!

FEATURES

- Cool stickman graphics.
- Easy scope controls.
- Rocking sound track!
